document_data.name: Bytopian Stout!
document_data.mainbody: '''Bytopian Stout!''' was an exotic alcoholic libation from the plane of [[Bytopia]].
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, Bytopian Stout! could be found among the so-called "[[Beer]]s of the Planes" served at [[Imel's Happy Tongue]], a casual eatery in the city of [[Athkatla]] in [[Amn]]. The "Beers of the Planes" were served along with the "[[Cheese]]s of the Planes", and the "Fruits of the Planes."
